children.name: Payment Behaviour for Procure to Pay (P2P) in Ariba

blocks.text: This dashboard offers a  view into the organization's financial health and supplier relationships by focusing on key performance indicators (KPIs) critical to the P2P process in Ariba.
Page 1: Overview- Important KPI's and charts
Page 2: Late Payment Analysis- Analysis of late payments in the current dataset.
Page 3: Invoice Analysis -  Analysis of invoices in the current dataset.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date"
        	< "Last Invoice Payment Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: On Time Payment Rate
children.description: % of payments done on or before due date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date"
        	>= "Last Invoice Payment Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS
SELECT sum("Last Invoice Item Amount"  ) FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of overdue invoices
children.description: Definition: An Invoice is considered as overdue if it is not cleared yet and the due date is in the past

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL) 
        	AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Invoice Clearing Time
children.description: Average number of days it takes for a to collect payment after issuing invoices for the goods

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Pay Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS PaymentTime
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Late Payment rates % by Top 5 Suppliers
children.description: Late Payment rates % by Top 5 Suppliers

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER 
(WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date")) / 
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
* 100 AS "Late Payment Rate %", "PO Item Supplier ID"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 5

children.name: Invoice Aging Analysis
children.description: Categorizing Invoice amount based on payment due date window

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Last Invoice Item Amount",
  CASE
    WHEN "Last Invoice Payment Date" <= "Last Invoice Due Date" THEN 'before or on Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '0day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '7day' THEN '0-7 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '7day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '14day' THEN '8-14 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '14day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '30day' THEN '15-30 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '30day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '60day' THEN '31-60 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '60day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '90day' THEN '61-90 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '90day' THEN '>90 days after Due Date'
  END AS "Payment Category"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL
  AND "Last Invoice Due Date" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  2 ASC
 NULLS LAST

children.name: Number of Invoices paid Late
children.description: Invoices that were paid after due date passed

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id" ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
      )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Duplicate Invoices
children.description: Duplicate invoices for same invoice,supplier and date

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) from
(SELECT  "Last Invoice Id" , "PO Item Supplier ID" , "Last Invoice Date" , 
COUNT("Last Invoice Id" ) AS DuplicateCount
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1,2,3) as a
where DuplicateCount>1

children.name: Average Time Until Invoice Due
children.description: Average Time for Invoices to become due after being issued by the supplier

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT LAST("Last Invoice Due Date" ))
- (SELECT LAST("Last Invoice Created Date"  ) ))
 FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of payments before last GR
children.description: Percentage of Payments before last Goods Receipt

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES('Receive PO Item' ~> 'Pay Invoice')
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Pay Invoice')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: PO to Invoice Ratio
children.description: Percentage of how purchase orders align with the number of invoices received

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(distinct "PO ID" )/count(distinct "Invoice ID" )*100 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: Here, you can identify the breakdowns of late payments by various factors like Supplier,Company Code, PR Type,etc . Please use further filters to drill down to particular cases.
Definition: Payments are considered late when the clearing of the Invoice happens after the Due Date of the Invoice Item.
The following two dates are compared:  "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  "Accounting Company Code"  AS "Company Code",
  SUM ("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Invoice Amount",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices"
FROM
  "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE
  (
    "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
  )
ORDER BY
  2 DESC
NULLS LAST

SELECT
  "PO Item Supplier ID"   AS "Supplier ID",
  SUM ("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Invoice Amount",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices"
FROM
  "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE
  (
    "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
  )
ORDER BY
  2 DESC
NULLS LAST

SELECT
  "Last PR Item Type",
  PaymentTime AS "Payment Time",
  "No. of Invoices"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "Last PR Item Type"   ,
      AVG (
        (
          SELECT
            LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
              WHERE
                EVENT_NAME IN ('Pay Invoice')
            )
        ) - (
          SELECT
            FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
              WHERE
                EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice')
            )
        )
      ) AS PaymentTime,
      COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices"
    FROM
      "THIS_PROCESS"
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
      )
    ORDER BY
      2 DESC
  ) AS selection
WHERE
  "PaymentTime" IS NOT NULL

SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date"
        	< "Last Invoice Payment Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Month",
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER 
(WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date")) /
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER 
(WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate%"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Invoice Value Paid Late
children.description: Invoice Amount Paid after Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
      )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices with Pending Payment

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id" ) FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
"Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id" ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
      )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
  "Vendor Number",
  "Company Code Name",
  "No. of Invoices paid late",
  "Invoice Amount paid late",
  "Posted as Overdue",
  "Short Payment Terms",
  "High Rework Rate"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      "PO Item Supplier ID"  AS "Vendor Number",
      "Accounting Company Code"  AS "Company Code Name",
      SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Invoice Amount paid late",
      COUNT("Last Invoice Id") AS "No. of Invoices paid late",
      count("Last Invoice Id") FILTER (
        WHERE
          "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
	AND "Last Invoice Due Date" - "Last Invoice Accounting Date" < DURATION '7days' 
      ) AS "Short Payment Terms",
      count("Last Invoice Id") FILTER (
        WHERE
          "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL 
        	AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
      ) AS "Posted as Overdue",
      COUNT("Last Invoice Id") FILTER (
        WHERE
          "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
          AND (
            SELECT
              BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1)
            FROM
              (
                SELECT
                  OCCURRENCE(event_name) AS occurrence
                  WHERE event_name != 'Receive PO Item'
              ) AS sub
          )
      ) AS "High Rework Rate"
    FROM
      THIS_PROCESS
    WHERE
      "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
  ) AS query
ORDER BY
  1,
  3

columnConfigurations.columnName: IF(AVG(Late Payment Rate %) % 1 >= 0.5, AVG(Late Payment Rate %) - AVG(Late Payment Rate %) % 1 + 1, AVG(Late Payment Rate %) - AVG(Late Payment Rate %) % 1)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Company Code Name",
"Vendor Name",
"# Cleared Invoices", 
"Cleared Amount",
CASE
    WHEN (avg("Late Payment Rate %") % 1) >= 0.5 
    THEN avg("Late Payment Rate %") - 
(avg("Late Payment Rate %") % 1) + 1
    ELSE avg("Late Payment Rate %") - 
(avg("Late Payment Rate %") % 1)
END AS "Late Payment Rate %",

"AVG Net Payment Terms",
"AVG Payment Time",
"AVG Paid Late Days"

FROM (
SELECT 
"PO Item Supplier ID"  AS "Vendor Name",
"Accounting Company Code"  AS "Company Code Name",
COUNT (DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id"  ) 
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' ) 
As "# Cleared Invoices", 

SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount"  )
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' )
As "Cleared Amount",
(
COUNT (DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") 
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' 
AND ("Last Invoice Payment Date"   - "Last Invoice Due Date")  > DURATION '1day')  
/ COUNT (DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") 
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' ) 
) * 100
AS "Late Payment Rate %",

AVG ("Last Invoice Due Date" - "Last Invoice Accounting Date" ) 
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' ) 
As "AVG Net Payment Terms",

AVG ("Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Accounting Date" ) 
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' ) 
As "AVG Payment Time",
CASE 
WHEN AVG ("Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date") < DURATION '0day' 
THEN NULL
ELSE
AVG ("Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date")
FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Pay Invoice' )
END AS "AVG Paid Late Days"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Invoice Due Date" IS NOT NULL
) as selections
ORDER BY 5 DESC, 4 DESC

blocks.text: This analysis would help identify bottlenecks and errors in the process and also allow for better cash flow management and improved supplier relationships

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Manual reconciled invoices rate
children.description: Percentage of invoices that have been reconciled manually due to submission method as paper invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling' 
    AND "Last Invoice Submission Method"= 'PaperInvoice'
	)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling'
	)     
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Invoice Approval Cycle Time
children.description: Average time taken to approve an invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Approve Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice')))) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Pay Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice')))) 

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
   SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Last Invoice Item Amount",
  CASE
    WHEN "Last Invoice Payment Date" <= "Last Invoice Due Date" THEN 'before or on Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '0day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '7day' THEN '0-7 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '7day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '14day' THEN '8-14 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '14day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '30day' THEN '15-30 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '30day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '60day' THEN '31-60 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '60day'
    AND (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) <= DURATION '90day' THEN '61-90 days after Due Date'
    WHEN (
      "Last Invoice Payment Date" - "Last Invoice Due Date"
    ) > DURATION '90day' THEN '>90 days after Due Date'
  END AS "Payment Category"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL
  AND "Last Invoice Due Date" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  2 ASC
 NULLS LAST

children.name: Manual reconciled invoices rate by PO Item Line Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT round(COUNT (DISTINCT "Invoice ID") 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling' 
AND "Last Invoice Submission Method" = 'PaperInvoice') /
COUNT (DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER 
(WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling') * 100 )
AS "Manual Reconciled Invoice Rate %", "PO Item Line Type"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) as "Invoice Volume",
 "PO Item Supplier ID" as "Supplier"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
group by 2
order by 1 desc
limit 10

SELECT COUNT(distinct "Last Invoice Id") from
(SELECT  "Last Invoice Id" , "PO Item Supplier ID" , "Last Invoice Date" , 
COUNT("Last Invoice Id") AS DuplicateCount
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1,2,3) as a
where DuplicateCount>1

SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status"  ='Rejected'

SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status"  ='Rejected')/
count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS
SELECT sum("Last Invoice Item Amount Paid")  FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices & Invoice Amount Paid by Currency

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) AS "No. of Invoices", 
SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) AS "Invoice Amount",
"Last Invoice Currency" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Number of Invoices & Invoice Amount Paid by Invoice Submission Method

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) AS "No. of Invoices",
SUM ("Last Invoice Item Amount") AS "Invoice Item Amount",
"Last Invoice Submission Method" 
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 3 
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT distinct "Last Invoice Payment Terms" as "Invoice Payment Terms" ,
count( distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) as "Number of Invoices"
, sum("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) as "Last Invoice Item Amount", 
sum("Last Invoice Item Discount Amount" ) as "Last Invoice Discount Amount"
,sum("PO Amount Discount" ) as "PO Amount Discount"
FROM 
 flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
order by 2 desc

SELECT "Last Invoice Id" , "PO Item Supplier ID" , "Last Invoice Date",
DuplicateCount from
(SELECT distinct "Last Invoice Id" , "PO Item Supplier ID" , "Last Invoice Date" , 
COUNT("Last Invoice Id" ) AS DuplicateCount
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 1,2,3) as a
where DuplicateCount>1
